items.title: Bulk deals : Aditya Birla AMC buys 1.5% stake in Medi Assist Healthcare Services
items.description: M7 Global Fund PCC - Cell Dewcap Fund bought 3.19 lakh shares in Ken Enterprises Limited for an average price of Rs 85.

items.title: AGI Greenpac seeks review of SC order quashing its resolution plan for Hindusthan National Glass
items.description: Container glass manufacturer AGI Greenpac is seeking relief against the apex court's judgment that had nullified its proposed resolution plan for Hindusthan National Glass.

items.title: IVCA President backs level-playing field between AIFs and MFs for new asset class
items.description: IVCA's Rajat Tandon believes that Sebi's proposed Systematic Investment Funds (SIF) could lead to a shift of clients away from Category III AIFs, owing to the lower ticket size and similar strategies.

items.title: Top gainers and losers today: Stocks that moved the most on February 12
items.description: Sensex and Nifty plunged, wiping out about Rs 7 lakh crore of investor wealth, while benchmarks extended losing streak for the sixth session.

items.title: Leading insurers SBI Life, HDFC Life, Bajaj Finserv rise 3% as Investec sees no setback in new tax bill
items.description: Brokerage Investec said that the new tax bill is not expected to change the preferential tax rates that apply to life insurance companies, instead keeping a status-quo, thus removing a major overhang for the sector.

items.title: Taking Stock: Sensex, Nifty fail to hold sharp bounce, end flat; metal, financials shine
items.description: More than 700 stocks touched their 52-week low, including Bayer CropScience, Sammaan Capital, Ircon Internation, Godrej Properties, JBM Auto, Whirlpool, DLF, Gujarat Gas, Jio Financial, Delhivery, Honeywell Automation, EIH, Tanla Platforms, Kirloskar Oil, Graphite India, among others.

items.title: Live: Nifty Recovers After Dropping Below 22,800; Midcaps Trim Losses | Closing Bell
items.description: Nifty stages a strong recovery, rebounding over 200 points from its low. Midcap index up nearly 3% with improved market breadth. Top gainers are Metals and PSU banks, and the sectors facing headwinds: Realty, IT & Pharma. Catch Nandita Khemka and Yatin Mota as they discuss stocks on their radar.

items.title: Graphite India shares crash 13% as Q3 earnings disappoint Street
items.description: Graphite India’s performance remains under pressure due to weak global demand, cost inflation, and volatile raw material prices.

items.title: Gensol Engineering shares dive 17% after Q3 earnings disappoints investors
items.description: During Q3, Gensol Engineering also won three significant orders, all of which are for solar PV projects, to be developed in Gujarat.

items.title: Ashok Leyland shares jump 8% after firm's Q3 net profit surges 36% to Rs 762 crore
items.description: It reported revenue from operations at Rs 11,995 crore. This marks an increase of over 8 percent from the Rs 11,066 crore revenue from operations reported in the corresponding quarter of the previous financial year.

items.title: Bajaj Healthcare shares hit 10% upper circuit as market reassesses profits in Q3FY25 earnings
items.description: The pharmaceutical company recorded profits in Q3 FY25 compared to a net loss in the corresponding quarter of last fiscal, while its revenue from operations rose 13.1 percent YoY on the back of higher demand.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade Bharti Airtel, HDFC Life, Cholamandalam Investment, DLF, Godfrey Phillips, and others on February 13?
items.description: The benchmark index is expected to be rangebound, with support at Wednesday's low. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.
